DOC.brief_summary: This observational study evaluate glucocorticoid spar effect 12 month treatment RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) patient rheumatoid arthritis . Data collect 12 month initiation treatment RoActemra/Actemra patient treatment > 5 mg prednisone equivalent least 3 month .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Glucocorticoid Use Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Treatment With RoActemra/Actemra ( Tocilizumab )
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Patients rheumatoid arthritis rheumatologist decide introduce RoActemra Patients take 5 mg/day oral prednisone ( equivalent ) least 3 month Participation clinical trial rheumatoid arthritis
